content: Hi, this is a potential agenda item for an upcoming meeting, so I'll add it to the agenda backlog. It seems there is a need to maintain visibility on resources as discussed in https://groups.google.com/forum/#!searchin/mozilla.dev.platform/Accuracy$20of$20the$20list$20of$20Rust$20components$20in$20and$20around$20$20$20$20$20$20$20Firefox%7Csort:date/mozilla.dev.platform/7fxrk-susEI/UsAlv5-yB AAJand I think also this is an implication of https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/122653-zulip/topic/Crate.20stream.20prefix.3F/near/196290565
